item.description: Hello MLUSA members, I visited the  Long Pond entrance to the Winchester  location on Saturday and the parking situation was dismal. I had to wait 15 minutes for a space to park. Since so many new members have joined, we really need a parking lot with ample room for all of our cars. The Stoneham location has a nice large parking lot and plenty of space to set up our tables for identification after the hunt. I apologize for any inconvenience the switch has caused anyone. I tried to keep the location as close to Winchester as possible to accommodate our members in that area. See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: 4 Woodland Rd Stoneham,Ma. next to John Flynn Skating Rink
item.name: New location for Sept.22nd hunt. Fellsway Reservation, Stoneham Entrance
